GOLD SPORTS NUTRITION BCAA has been expertly formulated to include all 3 vital amino. acids.L-Leucine, L-Isoleucine, and L- Valine are commonly grouped together and referred to as Amino Acids, or BCAAs, because of their unique branched chemical structure. BCAAs are essential, meaning they must be consumed through the diet since the human body cannot make them from other compounds.

Beyond BCAA supports muscular endurance, increased blood flow and enhanced nutrient delivery, allowing you to work out at a heightened

KEY BENEFITS

  • Development of lean muscle mass
  • Limits muscle tissue breakdown
  • Energy and nutrient delivery
  • Hydrates your muscles
  • Improves endurance and stamina
  • Helps reduce lactic acid build up
  • Muscle protein synthesis
  • Help reduce muscle soreness
  • Improves the use of fat for energy
  • Helps facilitate fat loss
  • Accelerates recovery
  • Reduces fatigue
  • Preserves muscle

WHEN SHOULD YOU TAKE GSN BCAA?

Taking GSN BCAA supplements between meals and before and after every workout will keep your body in a muscle-building and fat-burning state. A whey protein shake helps as well since it’s high in branch chain amino acids.

If your goal is to build mass, also consider taking a dose of GSN BCAAs first thing upon waking to help stop the muscle breakdown that is turned on during your night of fasting while you sleep.

SIZE : 120 CAPSULES
